jangama durakathana awama gasthuwa thawaduratath pahala damimata shri lanka widuli sandesha niyamana komishan sabhawa thiranaya kara atha.ee sandaha durakathana samagam wetha awasara labadi thibena bawath labana juli masaye sita nawa kramaya kriyathmaka kerena bawath shri lanka widuli sandesha niyamana komshan sabhawe adhyaksha janaral anusha palpita mahatha pawasayi.jangama durakathana sandaha widuli sandesha niyamana komishan sabhawa wisin danata niyama kara thibena miniththuwak sandaha wu rupiyal 2.00 awama gasthuwa nawa kramaya yatathe rupiyal 1.50 k wana bawada ee mahatha sandahan karayi.paribhogikayanta sahana salasima sandaha ayawaya lekhanaya mangin rajaya janathawata labadun poronduwak me mangin ituwana bawada hethema kiya siti.shri lankawe sthawara durakathanawalata sapekshawa jangama durakathana sabandathawe wishala wardhanayak pennum karana bawada anusha palpita mahatha penwa deyi.merata bhawitha karana durakathana pramanaya miliyana 20 kata aasanna wana bawath in miliyana 17 kata aasanna sankhyawak jangama durakathana bawa da widuli sandesha niyamana komishan sabhawe adhyaksha janaralwaraya sandahan karayi..

hathare pahara 12k saha haye pahara 6k samaga lakunu 118k ras kala tharaka hondamunige ge wishishta pithi harambaaya hethuwen kolambaa nalanda widuhalata erehiwa kadulu 8 wishishta jayak ath kara ganimata pannipitiya dharmapala widuhala samathwiya.anthar pasal 15n pahala krikat tharagawaliya yatathe pasugiyada pannipitiya dharmapala widyalayiya kridanganaye pawathi me tharagaye palamuwa panduwata paharadun nalanda pila lakunu 208k laba gaththeya.me jayagrahanayath samaga tharagawaliye dewani watayata piwisimata dharmapala widuhala samathwiya.nalanda widuhala – 208 – aushika perera 93 (ashan kawinda 22/2, himasha liyanage 22/2)dharmapala widuhala – 209/2 (tharaka hondamunige 118).

goniwala baha elawalu palathuru prawahanaya kirimen wasarakata rupiyal koti dedahasaka elawalu palathuru winasha weyi.wyaparikayata siduwana ema paduwa paribhogikayagen aya karana bawa samupakara ha abhyanthara welanda amathya jonstan pranandu mahatha pawasayi.me nithiya kriyathmaka kirima sambandhayen madhya sakachchawak amathiwarayage pradhanathwayen ema amathyanshaye di eeye (08) pawathwini.nithiya pilipadinne nathi wyaparikayan alla ganimata kolambaata elawalu ha palathuru prawahanaya karana margaye sthana 17ka watalime kandayam kriyathmaka weyi.nithiya kriyathmaka kirima sambandha athiwishesha gasat niwedanayak da nikuth kara thibe.ee nithiyata wada nokarana gowinta saha wyaparikayanta rupiyal dahase sita lakshaya dakwa wu dada gewimata siduwenu atha.gowinta rupiyal dahase sita rupiyal dasa dahasa dakwa da wyaparikayanta rupiyal dahase sita lakshaya dakwa da dada washayen sandahan wi thibe.plastik, wewal ho dawawalin thanu kuda me sandaha bhawitha kala hakiya.elawalu ha palathuru genayamata kuda yoda ganima yojanawa gena aawe mita wasara dekakata pamana peraya.ee sandaha gowinta sahana kalayak laba di thibuni.
